snippet: Critics of the American Bar Association said the decision was ironic since the group is supposed to explore issues about threats to free speech....
abstract: American Bar Assn refuses to publish report commissioned by committee of media lawyers that found Donald Trump is so-called libel bully who has filed numerous meritless lawsuits to attack his critics, despite never winning in court; association has pointed to risk of getting sued by Trump as justification.
lead_paragraph: Critics of the American Bar Association said the decision was ironic since the group is supposed to explore issues about threats to free speech.

headline.main: Fearing Trump, Bar Association Stifles Report Calling Him a ‘Libel Bully’
headline.print_headline: Bar Association Stifles Its Own Report Labeling Trump a ‘Libel Bully’
